passages.title: Beginnings
passages.content:
{P}Hello newborn. Welcome to life. Let's explore your new world together!
{N}Oh no. So scary woOoOooO!

passages.title: Explore
passages.content: As you grow, you'll have various experiences and make choices that shape your identity. Life is full of opportunities!

passages.title: ChooseYourPath
passages.content: You've grown up and now have the chance to choose your interests. What will you pursue?

passages.title: Band
passages.content: You join the band and meet your friend Peter. Peter is a lovely guy who loves to play.

passages.title: Football
passages.content: You start playing football and make friends with your teammates.

passages.title: Homework
passages.content:
You decide to focus on your homework, which leads you to discover your interest in a particular subject.
What subject should I explore further?

passages.title: Peter
passages.content:
Playing with Peter helps you bond and create lasting memories.
This is so much fun!

passages.title: Play football
passages.content:
You join your friends for a fun game of football, strengthening your friendships and enjoying some exercise.
Let's play!

passages.title: Do homework
passages.content:
Focusing on your homework helps you excel in your chosen subject and achieve your goals.
I'm learning so much!

passages.title: The book of spells
passages.content: As you delve deeper into your chosen subject, you discover a fascinating world of knowledge and possibilities.

links.text: Close the book and go back

passages.title: Random chapter
passages.content: You read a random chapter and learn something new and intriguing about your chosen subject.
